head.supplied: Paris 25 July 1892 ¶ Dear Baron ¶ ¶ The Minister of Foreign Affairs has just passed on to me the packet of seeds and the herbarium of Australian plants that you have kindly offered to the Museum of N...

div.p: MS AJ/15/59, f. 51, Archives Nationales, Paris.

Letter not found. The text is taken from a letter-copy book kept by the Muséum d’Histoire Naturelle, Paris. The copy is extremely faint and, as a result, some readings are uncertain. Paris le 25 Juillet 1892

p.seg: M. le Ministre des Affaires Etrangers vient de me fait parvenir le pacquet des Graines et l’herbier des plantes d’Australie que vous voulez bien offrir au Muséum d’Histoire naturelle.
J’ai l’honneur de vous adresser mes vifs remerciements pour ce nouveau témoignage de l’intérêt que vous portez à l’accroissement des richesses scientifiques de notre grand Etablissement National.

div.p: Veuillez agréer, Monsieur le Baron, l’assurance de ma considération très distinguée

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

p.seg: Monsieur le Baron Von Mueller, Botaniste du Gouvernement de Victoria à Melbourne (Australie).

div.p:
The Minister of Foreign Affairs has just passed on to me the packet of seeds and the herbarium of Australian plants that you have kindly offered to the Museum of Natural History.
f. 46 in the same letter-copy book is a copy of a letter from Milne-Edwards to the Minister of Foreign Affairs, acknowledging receipt of M’s package and asking the Minister to thank the Consul-General in Melbourne for his help in this matter.
I have the honour of expressing to you my lively thanks for this new evidence of the interest you take in increasing the scientific riches of our great National Institution.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;
font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;

div.p: Baron Von Mueller, Government Botanist of Victoria at Melbourne (Australia).
